import pandas as pd
import matplotlib.pyplot as plt

# 检查DataFrame是否存在且不为空
if 'sensor_data_df' in locals() and not sensor_data_df.empty:
    # 创建新的数据对象以避免修改原始数据
    df = sensor_data_df.copy()
    
    # 将Time列转换为时间索引
    df['Time'] = pd.to_datetime(df['Time'])
    df.set_index('Time', inplace=True)
    
    # 绘制Z4383的趋势图
    plt.figure(figsize=(10, 6))
    df['Z4383'].plot(title='Z4383 Trend Over Time')
    plt.xlabel('Time')
    plt.ylabel('Z4383 Value')
    plt.grid(True)
    plt.show()
else:
    print("DataFrame 'sensor_data_df' does not exist or is empty.")
